title: Responsive Web Design
desc: Seamless experiences across all screen sizes—your website will adapt beautifully to mobile phones, tablets, laptops, and desktops.

title: SEO Optimization
desc: Built with SEO best practices in mind. From clean, semantic HTML to meta tag implementation and performance tuning, your website will be optimized to rank higher and get discovered.
rbtn: Boost Visibility with Proven SEO Tactics

title: UI & UX Design
desc: Visually striking designs paired with intuitive navigation. I focus on creating interfaces that not only look great but also guide users effortlessly—boosting engagement and conversions.
rbtn: Discover the Power of Good Design

title: Performance Optimization
desc: Fast load times and smooth interactions for better user experience and lower bounce rates.
rbtn: Speed Up Your Website for Better Results

title: Accessibility
desc: Websites should be for everyone. I follow WCAG guidelines to make sure your site is fully accessible to users with disabilities, including screen reader support, keyboard navigation, and color contrast.
rbtn: Make Your Website Inclusive for All

title: Content Protection
desc: Add an extra layer of security by disabling right-click, text copying, and basic dev tools access—helping to deter unauthorized content theft or misuse.
rbtn: Learn How to Safeguard Your Content
